localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Founders Club is a cooperative and chaotic teambuilding game for 2-8 players. It challenges your team to complete simultaneous actions under time pressure. Just like when founding a startup, you'll be scrambling not to run out of time and money.
blogPost.body: Founders Club is a cooperative and chaotic teambuilding game for 2-8 players. It challenges your team to complete simultaneous actions under time pressure. Just like when founding a startup, you'll be scrambling not to run out of time and money.
blogPost.title: Founders Club by Atium - Does your team have what it takes to build a unicorn 🦄
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 创始人俱乐部》是一款适合2-8名玩家的合作和混乱的团队建设游戏。它挑战你的团队在时间压力下同时完成行动。就像创办创业公司时一样，你要争分夺秒，不能让时间和金钱耗尽。
localize.tagline: 你的团队是否具备打造独角兽的能力🦄。

localize.description: 創始人俱樂部》是一款適合2-8名玩家的合作和混亂的團隊建設遊戲。它挑戰你的團隊在時間壓力下同時完成行動。就像創辦創業公司時一樣，你要爭分奪秒，不能讓時間和金錢耗盡。
localize.tagline: 你的團隊是否具備打造獨角獸的能力🦄。

previous.excerpt: Steady Newsletters is for independent writers, who are looking for a home for their work and are not averse to making money from it. Send professionally designed newsletters, including videos, podcasts, and tweets. Free to use, we keep 10% commission.
previous.title: Steady Newsletters - Newsletters with paid memberships for independent writers

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是为独立作家，谁正在寻找一个家为他们的工作，并不反感从它赚钱。发送专业设计的新闻通讯，包括视频、播客和推特。免费使用，我们保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 为独立作家提供付费会员资格的新闻通讯。

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是爲獨立作家，誰正在尋找一個家爲他們的工作，並不反感從它賺錢。發送專業設計的新聞通訊，包括視頻、播客和推特。免費使用，我們保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 爲獨立作家提供付費會員資格的新聞通訊。

next.title:
Krispy Kreme giving away free donuts to vaccinated Americans

The irony

localize.full_text:
Krispy Kreme向接种疫苗的美国人免费赠送甜甜圈。

讽刺的是

Krispy Kreme向接種疫苗的美國人免費贈送甜甜圈。

諷刺的是
